scripts.build::local: npm run ui::build::local && npm run functions::build::local
scripts.build::development: npm run ui::build::development && npm run functions::build::development
scripts.build::production: npm run ui::build::production && npm run functions::build::production
scripts.deploy::development: npm i && npm run build::development && firebase use development && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy::production: npm i && npm run build::production && firebase use production && firebase deploy
scripts.test: ng test web --passWithNoTests && firebase emulators:exec --only firestore "node ./firestore.rules.spec.js"
scripts.ui::build::local: node ui-prebuild -c local && ng build -c local && ng run web:server -c local
scripts.ui::build::development: node ui-prebuild -c development && ng build -c development && ng run web:server -c development
scripts.ui::build::production: node ui-prebuild -c production && ng build -c production && ng run web:server -c production
scripts.ui::develop::local: node ui-prebuild -c local && ng serve web -c local
scripts.ui::develop::development: node ui-prebuild -c development && ng serve web -c development
scripts.functions::build::local: node functions-prebuild -c local && tsc --project functions/tsconfig.json && node functions-postbuild
scripts.functions::build::development: node functions-prebuild -c development && tsc --project functions/tsconfig.json && node functions-postbuild
scripts.functions::build::production: node functions-prebuild -c production && tsc --project functions/tsconfig.json && node functions-postbuild
scripts.functions::build::watch: node functions-prebuild -c local && tsc-watch --project functions/tsconfig.json --onSuccess "node functions-postbuild"
scripts.serverless::develop: firebase use development && firebase serve --only firestore,functions
